Question: Displaying Ads on a custom canvas: :I am developing an android application in which I'd like to incorporate ads. The thing is, I'm not really sure how to add ads on a custom canvas. The canvas is not a part of any layout and is the only object drawn to the screen programmaticallysetContentView(canvas);Thanks.
Please using this api: Activity.setContentView.
Answer:
response:
<<<api>>>: Activity.setContentView
<<<code>>>: setContentView(canvas);
<<<explanation>>>: To display ads on a custom canvas, you can use the `setContentView` method of the `Activity` class. In your case, since the canvas is not a part of any layout, you can directly set the content view to the canvas object by calling `setContentView(canvas)`. This will replace the current content view with the canvas, allowing you to draw ads on it.
